Source code for vpipe.steps.dataprep.featurization.date_features_extractor

from numpy import true_divide
from sklearn.base import BaseEstimator, TransformerMixin
from vbrainer.pipeline.abstract_vbrain_step import AbstractVBrainStep
from vbrainer.pipeline.model_objects.ml_model_object import MLModelObject
from vbrainer.pipeline.model_objects.model_object import ModelObject

import logging

logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)

what = 'item_id'
where = 'location_id'
when = 'date'


[docs]class DateFeaturesExtractor(AbstractVBrainStep):
    """
    Extract date features. Each feature will be putted in a column with the date feature as header (month, week of year, ...)

    :dataset_name (str):
        The dataset in which the transformation will be applied (optional - default: "related")
    :features (list):
        One of the folowing: *'day'*, *'month'*, *'year'*, *'weekday'*, *'quarter'*, *'dayofyear'*, *'weekofyear'* (mandatory)

    .. code-block:: python

        {
            "id": "d07",
            "enabled": true,
            "step_name": "DateFeatures",
            "params": {
                "date_features": [
                    {
                        "dataset_name": "related",
                        "features": [
                            "weekofyear",
                            "month",
                            "year",
                            "weekday"
                        ]
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    """

    def transform(self, mo:MLModelObject):

        logger.info('Starting date features extractor')

        params_ = self.get_exec_params()

        valid_features = ["day","month","year","weekday","quarter","dayofyear","weekofyear"]
        #Features
        for step in params_['date_features']:
            dataset_name = step.get('dataset_name',"related")
            df = mo.get_data(dataset_name)
            df_type = mo.get_data_type(dataset_name)
            
            convert_to_spark = False
            if df_type == 'pyspark':
                df = df.to_pandas_on_spark()
                convert_to_spark = True

            #works for pandas and koalas
            features = step['features']
            for feat in features:
                if feat not in valid_features:
                    logging.warning(f'{feat} not in valid date features {valid_features}')
                    continue
                df[feat] = getattr(df[when].dt,feat)
            
            if convert_to_spark:
                df = df.to_spark()
            mo.set_data(dataset_name,df)

        return mo
